task.summary: Default task
Updated readme
Updated configs Created filter_facebook_message function Added base for ios_remote Added bash script for automatic self-backups of pis. Added other configs for pi os.
Reset full project (bug with git folder in previous version.)
Added config files for simple remotes (lirc package)
Updated README.md (long overdue)
Fixed tv conf file. Added processed tv conf file. Added start of aircon conf file (not working). Added script to compute signal to send given one desired setting (in binary form)
Moved Sensor Drivers to temperature_monitoring folder. Created infrared_remote folder. Started aircon driver, to send custom messages to aircon.
Added file to manually send command (custom signal) through infrared. Not working state for now.
Fixed frequency parameter. Removed base test case.
Changed structure of how waves are sent with pigpio. Working prototype for aircon!!!!!!!
Moved signal_sender to global libraries. Clarified code. Fault-tolerance added Fixed documentation.
Removed lirc conf files from config folder. Added local/global package comment Added tv_remote, living_lights, bedroom_lights drivers. Grouped functions to signalSender
Extended RabbitMQ part in python to support interaction with other remotes.
Added pigpiod auto-start. Added error messages Added rabbitmq_credential_fail message Added fail-safe checks.
Exception handling added
Bug fixes in environment monitoring
Started working on android interface for aircon
Fixed general layout of aircon GUI for Android. Split Rabbit_Communication in java code.
Finalized GUI layout for aircon control in Android. Started working on Java code for aircon control in Android.
Finished most of Android remote backbone code. Radio button for mode still bugged (due to intermediate linearlayout). Added all bindings between gui and script.
Finished working code for aircon interface. Alpha version.
Updated readme
Added Error message logger in android app + removed "try until succes" of RabbitMQ connection
Changed layout TV remote.
Added full tracing of unhandled errors, to improve code with time Added custom logger option to stop polluting syslog
Added exception handling in environment sensors Added custom logger for rabbitmq worker
Started working on other remote modules for Android App.

Complete review of code structure for Android App. Moved from multiple activity, each with their own layout, that were supposed to switch from one to the other to one main activity calling small packages and hiding/showing layouts.
Finished Version 1.0 of Android App.
Moved lxml library to within-function instead of globally
Started switch to 100-character per line instead of 120.
Finished switch to 100-character per line instead of 120.
Added exception catch for urllib2 Merged some exceptions
Merged exceptions
Fixed doc Finished switch to 100char per line
Duplicated aircon driver to split bedroom+living Started adding customizable gpio pin number for different signal Added bedroom worker instead of just living-pi
Added cutomizable pin + check for which pi must send signal.
Added switch for aircon target in Android App
Added log of remote command sent Added split between living lights and bedroom lights
Updated todo
Added periodic check of RabbitMQ server state. Added function to get available space on Pi through RabbitMQ
Increase number of retry on DHT11 Added worker_sensors to report sensor measurements. Added log of full parsed configuration in home_environment_sensors
Started ssh instruction to control ssh service
Added master-side part of sensors/files instructions. Started adding master-side part of ssh instruction

Fixed pika_connector_manager + added exception handling Updated master_commands/config_general to include ssh/files/sensor Added check for previous logged error to avoid spamming log Updated config file to actual hardware
Bug fixes in worker_config (empty return, wrong attribute name, ...) Added try/catch in temperature monitoring if not a Raspberry Pi
Started adding sensor monitoring functionality through Android App
Added function to send mail through gmail client
Added part of rabbitMQ master functions on android app.
